Reviews.Content: excellent location five minutes termini station clean quiet requested hotel avoid noisy water pressure wasnt towels paper thin recommend avoiding breakfast service hotel reception staff helpful else value money stay bring towels time

Reviews.Title: “Close to Termini, good staff and affordable for Rome”
Reviews.Author: WorldTravellervm
Reviews.Content: hotel 3 streets main train station termini cafes street cheap cafes nearby air con extra wasnt budget nights worth extra dollars size staff friendly helpful sometimes street nosy sleep impossible otherwise fine

Reviews.Title: “Good value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelfanaticsUk
Reviews.Content: chose hotel central location 2 minutes walk termini rail metro stations 20 minutes walk colosseum billed 2 star hotel facilities breakfast 2 stars terms quality huge bed firm comfortable bathroom fine shower basin toilet bidet bedroom bathroom spotlessly clean clean towels day bath towels waffle cotton bit teatowels front overlooking street noisy leave windows nice quiet breakfast excellent continental breakfast orange juice tea coffee cereals cornflakes muesli fresh bread rolls wirth butter jam croissants danish pastries apricot tart bar restaurant hotel thats plenty trattorias bars neighbourhood aqua nera meals reasonable 1222 euros course tourist menu choice starter main course theres supermarket close sells wine beer spirits etc reception staff helpful lending bottle opener

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: ADMarshall
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel romantica september 2010 arrived rome 915 am leonardo express train airport termini train station hotel close termini easy able check nice check easy painless 3rd floor tiny elevator floor fine using sleep shower it’s star” hotel tiny safe wall window noisy street below tv didn’t watch english stations bathroom shower decent note hotel provide shampoo conditioner soap fresh coat paint walls bedspread cleaning removed stored armoire bed comfortable bring earplugs street noise terrible booked hotel reasons reasons air conditioning weren’t hot rome september looking yes hotel offer air additional 10 euros night ahead opted 80s stuffy little disappointing pay extra reason booked hotel offered free wifi true card front desk night cards hour night card card indefinitely extra charge access cards enjoyed hotel breakfast rate included breakfast ate day read negative reviews breakfast enjoyed cereal milk breads pastries orange juice coffee cappuccino delicious overall fine stay hotel location close restaurants nice grocery store close main train station travel city easy safe night reception manned 24 hours day

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Service”
Reviews.Author: aileronguy
Reviews.Content: start positives clean rome located close train station saves packing luggage town customer service overall value paid 70 euros pay extras lead believe included air conditioning reception tried couldnt figure reception extra 10 euro night tried protest lead believe included avail informed breakfast checked failed mention extra 10 euro low price wasnt low checked remaining euro cash save exchange fee pay rest credit card numerous times returning abroad reception didnt couldnt didnt pleaded avail simply help overall low price warrant low level service

Reviews.Title: “The best value for your money.”
Reviews.Author: Baboly
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights hotel cant complain stay rome relax busy day visiting beauty city thats hotel breakfast spoke evan receptionist margin limited commission pay web sites book solution close grocery store buy bring breakfast days breakfast otherwise survive breakfast 7 days stayed value hotel rome friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Close to the main station, kind staff, good price!”
Reviews.Author: sjave
Reviews.Content: location perfect 5 min walking main station metro buses connection tired walk opposite town check bus stop youll surely bus station staff definitely helpful information breakfast price definitely cleaned furnished classic style noisy family wall probably living view window definitely poor 2 night stay problemand anyway rome beauty
